channel.title: Quest Problem
channel.description:
Hey guys.
I made a new quest, but everytime i make a new character, the quest is automatically done.
I tried to make a different quest, and the same thing happened.
Can anybody give me a lil guide to make it stop doing this pls!

item.title: Quest Problem
item.dc:creator: @Vendetta_LG Vendetta_LG
item.description:
@Vendetta_LG wrote:

when i search for

“q1 =”

the only thing which is to do with the intergers is:

		characterfile.write("character-q1 = ", 0, 15);
		characterfile.write(Integer.toString(q1), 0, Integer.toString(q1).length());
		characterfile.newLine();

and the Booleen, i changed the 15 to 0, im going to check now, see if its that

edit@

nope, what java files should i look in?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 20, 2008, 03:02:57 pm[/size][hr]-fixed-

lock or delete thread please.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Problem
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Yeah, search for q1 =
You’ll get a couple of results.

I can’t show you what to do, but that’s one of the things you’ll need to help you.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Problem
item.dc:creator: @Vendetta_LG Vendetta_LG
item.description:
@Vendetta_LG wrote:

Thanks for the quick reply.

but i dont get what you mean.

i dont know where to set the ‘interger’

  • is it this in client.java

      	characterfile.write("character-q1 = ", 0, 15);
  	characterfile.write(Integer.toString(q1), 0, Integer.toString(q1).length());
  	characterfile.newLine();

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Problem
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Set the starting integer to 0, and if you complete the quest, have the green text appear only when the quest int is at a certain point. (E.g - finished is 3)

Read full topic
